page.title: 09 RAINFORD INDUSTRIES CONT.
page.content: Probably the main industry on the ind- ustrial estate is Carborundum which was established in 1948 and took over the site from Rainford Potteries.Carbor- undum produces 3 main items;high temperature heat-resistant refactory bricks,shapes and tiles;electric furnace heating elements and ceramic fibres similar to fibreglass,but more resistant.There are a total of 265 employees in the company,making it the largest on the estate. Other industries on the estate include Hoyles Fire and Safety Ltd.,who deal in fire extinguishers,alarms etc.;Hi- Qualco for high quality paint and varnish coatings-a second subsiduary company of Rainford Metals;and Rainford Printing Company which makes printing materials and prints advertisments etc.
